author: mharwood
msg: Initial commit of LUCENE-1486 - a subclass of the default QueryParser that overrides the parsing of PhraseQueries to allow more complex syntax e.g. wildcards in phrase queries

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-1145: Add capability to specify an infoStream log file for the underlying Lucene IndexWriter in solrconfig.xml

author: kstam
msg: JUDDI-262 Adding Publisher portlet, which shows a list of publishers.
